message: I propose a division where I receive $6000 and you receive $4000. This way, we can split the funds fairly while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose we split the money more evenly, giving you $4000 and me $6000.  This offers a fair starting point for negotiation, and helps to minimize the impact of the decreasing value of the money.

Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a division where I receive $5400 and you receive $4600. This maintains a balance while accounting for the inflationary effects on our potential gains.
